Attention All:

Due to the recent ransomware outbreak, our security team is pushing a high-priority, out-of-band patch. It is imperative to visit the following site to ensure your machine has been updated and is secure. There is no time for our IT administrator to update all machines themselves. You're help is required!

Update now

Information Technology Division

html:
Greetings,

Preparing for travel may be stressful, but it doesn't need to be. You are encouraged to keep these screening and travel tips in mind to help facilitate the packing and screening process on your next trip to the airport. To ensure a stress-free trip, please visit our employee resources website here. 

For local airport updates, including passenger restrictions and security updates, please refer to the Travel FAQ Page.

Security Customer Service Center
name: Travel Tips
subject: Travel Tips
text:
Greetings,

Preparing for travel may be stressful, but it doesn't need to be. You are encouraged to keep these screening and travel tips in mind to help facilitate the packing and screening process on your next trip to the airport. To ensure a stress-free trip, please visit our employee resources website here. 


For local airport updates, including passenger restrictions and security updates, please refer to the Travel FAQ Page.

Feedback from you is very important as we try to focus on areas that need improvement. Upon completion, you will have an opportunity to enter a drawing where one randomly selected person will receive an iPad Air 2 (16 GB) valued at $399.

An independent market research company, is performing this survey on behalf of <%CUSTOMER_NAME%>.

Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback.
PR Ninja Team

html:
Account Termination Request Received
Ticket No: 039286593284

Dear <%TARGET_FULL_NAME%>,

Thank you for contacting support. We acknowledge receipt of your account termination request. If you did not make this request, please proceed to our secure Provider Portal https://accounts.myproviderportal.com/ui/html/#/inbox within the next 24 hours to cancel the request. To protect personally identifiable information, we cannot restore accounts once terminated.

Your ticket number for this support interaction is mentioned in the email header. Please quote this on any further interactions with us for a speedier response.

Best Regards,
IT Support Team

Help - FAQ, services, and more available at IT Support website
http://accounts.myproviderportal.com/updox-ui/

html:
Hello <%TARGET_FIRST_NAME%>,


The IT Department was running an email server migration last night and encountered an error with several email accounts. Your account <%TARGET_EMAIL%> happened to be one of them. We attempted to resolve this problem and believe we have fixed it.

If your email has been working just fine, please let us know by going to this secure link and validate your email address is working.


Thanks for your quick cooperation,

IT
name: Email Migration Issue
subject: Email Migration Issue
text:
Hello <%TARGET_FIRST_NAME%>,




The IT Department was running an email server migration last night and encountered an error with several email accounts. Your account <%TARGET_EMAIL%> happened to be one of them. We attempted to resolve this problem and believe we have fixed it.

If your email has been working just fine, please let us know by going to this secure link and validate your email address is working.




Thanks for your quick cooperation,

IT

html:
This email is being sent to all employees with a company email address. If someone on your team does not have an company email, please refer them to our intranet to read this and other company wide communications. If you have issues accessing our intranet, please use the attached instructions.


Breaking News

What's been happening at our company?

We are very proud to talk about what has been happening at our company. There is so much going on to be proud of in multiple divisions and across the globe. But what make this email more important aside from showing you what is going on in other departments is discussing how this will effect you.


We want to make sure that no employee feels left out because we value you <%TARGET_FIRST_NAME%>.


I'm sure your eager to hear about what's going on at our company, so go ahead and click the link below to read about what's going on. We appreciate your time and continued dedication as a employee at our company.


Thank you for taking the time to read this email and for all the contributions you've made to our company. Remember you are a valued employee here and we look forward to hearing from you in the future


Exciting News

Best Regards:

The news Team
name: breakingNews
subject: Hey guys! Breaking News!

html:
Dear caring citizen!


Did you know that in a typical office, hundreds of sheets of paper are wasted every day?


We hear that the Defenders of the Paper is trying to draw attention to the fact that a lot of unnecessary paper is wasted every day. Many people do not understand how easy it is to save paper by ditching paper or consuming paper. One beautiful living tree is about 100 sheets of paper. So please don't waste paper! Share this letter with others to contribute to the spread of information!


Please help this mission by visiting their website and allied with us to support the cause. 


<%FAKER_SAFE_DOMAIN_NAME%>


Thank you for changing your office,

<%FAKER_FIRST_NAME_FEMALE%>
name: Paper Awareness
subject: Stop Wasting Paper!
text: Dear caring citizen!Did you know that in a typical office, hundreds of sheets of paper are wasted every day?We hear that the Defenders of the Paper is trying to draw attention to the fact that a lot of unnecessary paper is wasted every day. Many people do not understand how easy it is to save paper by ditching paper or consuming paper. One beautiful living tree is about 100 sheets of paper. So please don't waste paper! Share this letter with others to contribute to the spread of information!Please help this mission by visiting their website and allied with us to support the cause. <%FAKER_SAFE_DOMAIN_NAME%>Thank you for changing your office,<%FAKER_FIRST_NAME_FEMALE%>

Our system has detected irregular activity on your account. Taking precautions, certain limitations an measures have been placed on your account in accordance of the User Agreement and Privacy Policy.

To regain access without any interruption to you account, please visit our Security Customer Support Center to help you re-validate your account activity and keep your account safe from potential risk.

Please read the entire page and follow all directions to validate your account.

Thanks for your cooperation.

IT Helpdesk

html:
IMPORTANT SECURITY NOTICE UPDATE

Due to a recent rise in security breaches in our industry, our policies now mandate higher security standards. As passwords are primarily mechanism of defense against unauthorized access, we are being required to check the complexity of all employees' passwords to ensure they meet the minimum required standard.

Please assist us in being complaint and visit https://test.passwordometer.com to test the strength of your passwords.

Thank you for your cooperation,
IT Administration and Security Teams
name: Password Complexity Check
subject: Employee Password Review
text:
IMPORTANT SECURITY NOTICE UPDATE

Due to a recent rise in security breaches in our industry, our policies now mandate higher security standards. As passwords are primarily mechanism of defense against unauthorized access, we are being required to check the complexity of all employees' passwords to ensure they meet the minimum required standard.

Please assist us in being complaint and visit https://test.passwordometer.com to test the strength of your passwords.

Thank you for your cooperation,
IT Administration and Security Teams

html:
All Staff:

In the coming weeks, new social media policies will be implemented that will affect all staff. Due to recent events in the news we are going to start blocking many of the popular social media sites for employees who do not need them for justified, business purposes.

We need your help to determine if you utilize social media and how you feel about this policy change. We have created a portal page on our internal network to get each employees usage of social media so we can determine which policy should be applied to your workstation. 

Please visit the Portal Page and complete this survey.

Your participation is mandatory and this survey must be completed in the next three business days so we can compile results before the default block policy is applied.

Thank you,
Social Media Compliance Team
name: Social Media Policy [Internal Unknown]
subject: Social Media Policy
text: All Staff:In the coming weeks, new social media policies will be implemented that will affect all staff. Due to recent events in the news we are going to start blocking many of the popular social media sites for employees who do not need them for justified, business purposes.We need your help to determine if you utilize social media and how you feel about this policy change. We have created a portal page on our internal network to get each employees usage of social media so we can determine which policy should be applied to your workstation. Please visit the Portal Page and complete this survey.Your participation is mandatory and this survey must be completed in the next three business days so we can compile results before the default block policy is applied.Thank you,Social Media Compliance Team

subject: Attention: Upgrade mail quota now to avoid loss of data !
text:
The ”<%TARGET_EMAIL%>”  email account is nearly full. The email account currently uses 97% of it's capacity. UPGRADE NOW Please upgrade your account to a larger quota *Note*: Quota cannot exeed 5PB.

You should remove some emails from the mailbox as soon as possible in

order to prevent the loss of any future email.

html:
You have received a secure message.

Read your secure message by going here. 

You will be prompted for login information in order to open the message.

Your username is your email and your temporary password is <%FAKER_PASSWORD%>

If you have any concerns about the validity of this message, or for questions about MySecKey's email encryption service, please review our service guidelines available here.

First time users - will need to register in order to download the message.
Help - FAQ, services, and more available at MySecKey website https://secure.myseckey.org

html:
All Staff,

In accordance with <%CUSTOMER_NAME%> policy, we are required to host an outside corporation in an annual audit of our security practices. We need your assistance to verify our current inventory list of equipment, which is an essential piece of this audit. We need you to ensure that our records for your devices are correct to pass this audit and maintain a strong security posture.

What you need to do:
  • Find all devices (desktops, laptops, tablets, cell phones, etc) that were signed out to you
  • Locate the serial number on these devices
  • Open the link below to verify our current records
  • If anything is incorrect, please update the form
Please click here to complete the following form within the next 48 hours.

We appreciate your assistance in maintaining our compliance with security best practices. You are a key aspect to ensuring this security audit is an easy pass.

IT Department
name: Security Audit [Fear_Curiosity]
subject: Equipment Inventory - Security Audit
text: All Staff,In accordance with <%CUSTOMER_NAME%> policy, we are required to host an outside corporation in an annual audit of our security practices. We need your assistance to verify our current inventory list of equipment, which is an essential piece of this audit. You are a key aspect to ensuring this security audit is an easy pass.IT Department

html:
Team,

As many of you are aware, annual funding for our program expires at the end of this quarter. A lapse would mean that a number of activities would cease due to a lack of provisioned funds, and that a number of engagements would be temporarily frozen. To prepare for this possibility, we are working to update our contingency plans for executing an orderly shutdown of activities that would be affected by a lapse in appropriations.

You will find our most up-to-date contingency plans here including the list of departmental funding freezes and the shutdown procedures we all must prepare for now.

Sincerely,
Office of Chief Financial Coordinator
name: Funding Lapse
subject: Funding Lapse
text:
Team,

As many of you are aware, annual funding for our program expires at the end of this quarter. A lapse would mean that a number of activities would cease due to a lack of provisioned funds, and that a number of engagements would be temporarily frozen. To prepare for this possibility, we are working to update our contingency plans for executing an orderly shutdown of activities that would be affected by a lapse in appropriations.

You will find our most up-to-date contingency plans here including the list of departmental funding freezes and the shutdown procedures we all must prepare for now.

Sincerely,

description: Assigned as lead reviewer for resume
html:
**This is an automated message**

<%TARGET_FULL_NAME%>,

You have been assigned as the lead reviewer for the following submitted
resume and CV:

*APPLICANT NAME*: <%FAKER_FIRST_NAME%> <%FAKER_LAST_NAME%>
*APPLICANT ID*: <<<<<<<<<<<<%TOKEN%>>>>>>>>>>>>
*POSITION*: <%FAKER_JOB%>
*LOCATION*: <%FAKER_CITY%>
*ATTACHMENTS*:
<%FAKER_FIRST_NAME%>_<%FAKER_LAST_NAME%>_resume.pdf
<%FAKER_FIRST_NAME%>_<%FAKER_LAST_NAME%>_application.pdf
<%FAKER_FIRST_NAME%>_<%FAKER_LAST_NAME%>_survey.pdf

Please login to the portal to complete the review. To decline or reassign the reviewer position, please contact the jobs administrator
